infotexts.TooManyBaro.options.tooltip.refreshtime: Timer in milliseconds to refresh the ingredients shown in the recipes when there is multiples subrecipes
infotexts.TooManyBaro.options.tooltip.reopenrecipe: Check if you want the UI to automatically reopen the recipes as the first tab after you close it. When it's not check, when you press O the UI will open on the last tab open.
